Package ossj.qos.ri.pm.threshold.adapter

Interface Summary
EnvironmentConstants Environment constants used for the threshold monitor EJBs.
MessageConstants Message constants used by the threshold monitor EJBs.
ThresholdMonitorEntity These are the public business mehtods of the ThresholdMonitorEntityBean.
ThresholdMonitorEntityHome This is the home interface for the ThresholdMonitorEntityBean.
ThresholdMonitorEntityLocal These are the local business methods of ThresholdMonitorEntityBean.
ThresholdMonitorEntityLocalHome This is the local home inteface for ThresholdMonitorEntity.
ThresholdMonitorStatus Different status for threshold monitors.
 

Class Summary
ThresholdMonitorBean Threshold Monitor implementation.
ThresholdMonitorEntityBean A container-managed persistent entity bean.
ThresholdMonitorMessageBean The message-driven bean listens for performance monitor events, evaluates them with the threshold monitor entity beans and sends threshold monitor alarms if a threshold is violated (crossed or cleared).
 

Exception Summary
ThresholdMonitorException Threshold Monitor Exception.
